name: LangGraph Multi-Agent Sentiment Coordinator
description: Advanced multi-agent sentiment analysis coordinator using LangGraph with consensus building and agent debate capabilities. Orchestrates specialized sentiment agents that can discuss disagreements and reach consensus through iterative refinement.

skills.name: Multi-Agent Consensus Analysis
skills.description: Coordinates multiple specialized sentiment agents to analyze text and build consensus through discussion rounds

skills.name: Agent Debate Facilitation
skills.description: Detects disagreements between agents and facilitates discussion rounds to refine analyses and reach consensus

skills.name: Disagreement Detection
skills.description: Automatically detects when agents disagree on sentiment analysis and triggers discussion workflow

skills.name: Consensus Building
skills.description: Uses configurable thresholds and iterative refinement to build agent consensus on complex reviews

skills.name: Specialized Agent Orchestration
skills.description: Manages quality, experience, user experience, business, and technical agents for comprehensive analysis

agent_types.description: Types of agents to include in analysis

max_discussion_rounds.description: Maximum number of discussion rounds between agents

disagreement_threshold.description: Threshold for triggering agent discussion (0.0 = always discuss, 1.0 = never discuss)

enable_consensus_debate.description: Enable/disable agent debate and consensus features

max_tokens_per_agent.description: Maximum tokens per individual agent analysis

consensus_building.description: Agents can discuss disagreements and refine their analyses

agent_debate.description: Facilitates structured debates between specialist agents

specialized_agents.quality: Focuses on product quality and manufacturing aspects
specialized_agents.experience: Analyzes customer experience and service interactions
specialized_agents.user_experience: Evaluates usability and user interface aspects
specialized_agents.business: Assesses business value and market positioning
